column4: someone please come with me to #winehq and help me get some answers out of these people.  You know that once you install a game on wine, it cannot be uninstalled?
please do not use Ubuntu channels as recruitment centers for your army of WINE wrath
no, srsly. do not ask people to join other channels to help you rant.
sorry, i mistook you people for my friends.  i will not make the same mistake again
